title: League wont open/function
body: So this started a while back, i had a problem with the alpha client and had to uninstall and reinstall. However, upon re-installation, the game launcher wont function correctly. when it first launches prior to the installing, there is no updating or anything as it should. it asks if i want to update to the alpha client (with the multiple times I've tried, neither choice will make it work), lets say i hit yes, it shows the launch screen, no update queued or anything. I hit the launch and await the login screen. But oh no, instead i get a message saying "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League Alpha client to try again. at first i thought id just have to relaunch and try updating again, but this time it just shows that i can update but doesn't give me the option to.** Rito, I've given you too much money for this to happen to me :'(**

replies.body:
This issue usually happens if something went wrong during the patching or client update process. You should be able to resolve this by going into your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file and then launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*).

If that didn't result in another patch that fixed the issue, you'll have to complete a clean reinstall following [**this specific guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to resolve this. Let me know what worked for you.

No luck. firstly there is no .exe files within the whole program. there haven't been in any of the multiple times ive re-installed in the past mont, month and a half. and i had hopes for the second thing so i did it step by step. Control panel, delete, cc clean (i did twice to be sure), restart, re-install. and its still giving me the "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League Alpha client to try again"
When you go to install League, are you attempting to install it to a custom directory or are you installing to the default directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)?
I am not altering the download at all, i only hit next, accept and finish

In that case, we'll need to take a close look at your system logs to determine what else could be causing this. I recommend running those logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a new [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will be in touch to continue troubleshooting this with you.
